title: Apocalypse of John - Chapter 8 - Trumpets and Harps: The Dividing of Spirits
description:
This chapter covers the 14th and 15th chapters of Revelation.

Topics of note that we discuss "the Everlasting Gospel", the 144,000, and the connection of Judaism and Christianity to the solar mysteries.
